author: Bob Pisani
title: Watch now: ETF Edge on the race to zero commissions and the bitcoin ETF
content:

CNBC's ETF Edge is dedicated to the fastest-growing trend in investing right now: ETFs. Every Monday, Bob Pisani will be joined by a panel o… [+118 chars]
